question:
####UFAQ [Damon Stone]
If the Corp draws an agenda and a non-agenda with [Daily Business Show](/en/card/06086) and uses Political Dealings to install the agenda, is the Corp forced to return the non-agenda card to the bottom of R&D?
answer:
No, the Corp can return the installed agenda to the bottom of R&D if desired, as the game still knows that it was drawn by Daily Business Show.

If the Corp draws two agendas with Daily Business Show and uses Political Dealings to install both agendas, is the Corp forced to return one of the installed agendas to the bottom of R&D?
